name: Nine-Tailed Shadow
description:
A short tactics/puzzle/stealth game made for Godot Wild Jam #50 - Theme: Ritual.

You're dead, but your loyal followers are working to change that. Stick to the shadows and collect the reagents they need to bring your spirit back to the mortal realm.

Known issue: The HTML 5 version seems to freeze for a few seconds during scene transitions, and performance may be hit or miss. Shadows may not render. Try restarting the level to fix the latter issue. In either case, we recommend the downloadable version to avoid problems.

Music sourced from Liborio Conti at no-copyright-music.com.
